overview_of_class: This course will provide a basic understanding of how to proficiently execute movements of the Lester Horton Technique. This course will focus on musicianship, quality of movement, balance, stamina, flexibility, dynamics and coordination. Students will gain strength and range of linear movement and progress their development as an artist.
name: Modern l
title: SoC DANCE 150-0-20 Modern l
enrl_requirement: Enrollment Requirements: Pre-Registration is restricted to Dance Majors and Minors at this time. Registration will open to all undergraduates during the second week of regular registration.
